name: Look Busy, Wizard!
description:
Extremely early build. Not nearly feature complete, but you can try out the basic systems of this combo breakout/typing game.

Time spent writing copy could be better spent on dev time, so this is it for now.

Controls

A/D: move left/right

LMB: launch ball

RMB: cast current spell

Q/E: previous/next spell

Space: enter/exit job mode

R: restart game
